name: Newsletters
description: This plugin populates a list of recently added/deleted/updated media, sends out the messages to configured clients(email, discord webhook & telegram).
overview: Send newsletters for recently added/deleted/updated media

versions.changelog:
- Multiple instance support for Email, Discord, Telegram clients with per-client library/event settings
- New "Modern" Email Template
- UI Improvements (Collapsible sections, cleaner layout)
- FULL CHANGELOG: https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Sanidhya30/Jellyfin-Newsletter/master/CHANGELOG.md

- Telegram client support for the newsletters
- Disabled CRL check in smtp
- Minor bug fix
- FULL CHANGELOG: https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Sanidhya30/Jellyfin-Newsletter/master/CHANGELOG.md

- Minor enhancement for item processing queue.
- Bug fix: Added handling of item URLs when hostname is empty in configuration.
- FULL CHANGELOG: https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Sanidhya30/Jellyfin-Newsletter/master/CHANGELOG.md

- Added option to configure decimal places for community rating display in newsletters.
- Added per-library selection for series and movies, allowing users to choose specific libraries.
- JavaScript code refactoring for improved UI functionality.
- FULL CHANGELOG: https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Sanidhya30/Jellyfin-Newsletter/master/CHANGELOG.md

- Migrating from SmtpClient to MailKit. (Fixes the authentication fails issue for proton mail)
- FULL CHANGELOG: https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Sanidhya30/Jellyfin-Newsletter/master/CHANGELOG.md

- Minor bug fix
- FULL CHANGELOG: https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Sanidhya30/Jellyfin-Newsletter/master/CHANGELOG.md

- Event-Based Newsletters for added/updated/deleted media
- Enhanced Discord support with customizable embed colors for different events
- New template tags: {EventBadge} and {ItemURL}
- Improved event handling and item processing logic
- FULL CHANGELOG: https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Sanidhya30/Jellyfin-Newsletter/master/CHANGELOG.md

- Support for Jellyfin 10.11.x.
- FULL CHANGELOG: https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Sanidhya30/Jellyfin-Newsletter/master/CHANGELOG.md

- Bug fix for querying title in the newsletter.db.
- FULL CHANGELOG: https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Sanidhya30/Jellyfin-Newsletter/master/CHANGELOG.md

- Bug fix for community rating parsing.
- Bug fix for parsing runtime. FULL CHANGELOG: https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Sanidhya30/Jellyfin-Newsletter/master/CHANGELOG.md

- Event based scanning: Now the plugin is configured to scan the library only when a media item is added or removed, instead of every 4 hours.
- Removal of ScanLibraryTask.
- Bug Fix and Code refactoring.
- FULL CHANGELOG: https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Sanidhya30/Jellyfin-Newsletter/master/CHANGELOG.md

- Feature to add support for to and bcc email addresses.
- Update ImageSharp to the latest version.
- FULL CHANGELOG: https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Sanidhya30/Jellyfin-Newsletter/master/CHANGELOG.md

- Test custom email templates before sending newsletters.
- Fix default email templates not being applied.
- FULL CHANGELOG: https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Sanidhya30/Jellyfin-Newsletter/master/CHANGELOG.md

- Minor bug fix.
- FULL CHANGELOG: https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Sanidhya30/Jellyfin-Newsletter/master/CHANGELOG.md

- Local Poster attachment support.
- In-memory size reduction for poster images.
- Bug fixes. FULL CHANGELOG: https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Sanidhya30/Jellyfin-Newsletter/master/CHANGELOG.md

- Discord webhook support.
- Discord config addition in the plugin page.
- Moving to TMDB api for fetching poster image.
- Plugin page update.
- Code refactoring to support future clients support. FULL CHANGELOG: https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Sanidhya30/Jellyfin-Newsletter/master/CHANGELOG.md

- Major code refactoring.
- Database updates for new available Tags.
- Catch all for any missed tags in newsletter output.
- Alert for "Test mail" button.
- Minor bug fix post 0.6.3.0 release FULL CHANGELOG: https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Cloud9Developer/Jellyfin-Newsletter-Plugin/master/CHANGELOG.md

- Major code refactoring.
- Database updates for new available Tags.
- Catch all for any missed tags in newsletter output.
- Alert for "Test mail" button.
- Minor bug fix post 0.6.3.0 release FULL CHANGELOG: https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Cloud9Developer/Jellyfin-Newsletter-Plugin/master/CHANGELOG.md

- Major code refactoring.
- Database updates for new available Tags.
- Catch all for any missed tags in newsletter output.
- Alert for "Test mail" button.
- Minor bug fix post 0.6.3.0 release FULL CHANGELOG: https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Cloud9Developer/Jellyfin-Newsletter-Plugin/master/CHANGELOG.md

- Major code refactoring.
- Database updates for new available Tags.
- Catch all for any missed tags in newsletter output.
- Alert for "Test mail" button. FULL CHANGELOG: https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Cloud9Developer/Jellyfin-Newsletter-Plugin/master/CHANGELOG.md
